text: Kitne Kool Hai Hum is an Indian comedy drama series created and co-produced by Ekta Kapoor and Shobha Kapoor under their banner Balaji Telefilms.Balaji Telefilms next show titled 'Kitne Kool Hai Hum' on Zee TV The series premiered on 15 April 2002 on Zee TV.Balaji Telefilms new sitcom 'Kitne Kool Hai Hum' premieres on Zee TVBalaji Telefilms new show on Zee TV is a sitcom ==Plot== The series revolves around the Chapanaria family who lives in Dhanduka village in rural Gujarat. The series explores how they become millionaires when they receive millions from the will of their grandfather. The series traces their day to day experiences which turn into comedy when they shift from their rural village to the posh city of Mumbai. == Cast == * Jayati Bhatia * Shoma Anand * Darshan Jariwala * Anurag Prappana * Aashish Kaul * Rucha Gujarathi * Karishma Tanna * Anand Goradia * Kusumit Sana * Dheeraj Sarna == References == == External links == *Official Page Category:Balaji Telefilms television series Category:Indian television sitcoms Category:Zee TV original programming Category:2002 Indian television series debuts Category:2003 Indian television series endings
title: Kitne Kool Hai Hum
